prompt: A serene landscape of Mewar, with a glimpse of the majestic Chittor Fort.
dialogue: In the year 1540, a new star was born in the kingdom of Mewar... Udai Singh II, the ruler of Mewar, and his queen Jaiwanta Bai, welcomed their son, Maharana Pratap. Little did they know, this young prince would one day become the symbol of Rajput resistance against the Mughal Empire.
